function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct comprehensive local needs assessments, involve community stakeholders in policy development, prioritize sustainable and inclusive transport solutions","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish international agreements and partnerships, promote information sharing and collaboration, develop unified standards and protocols for transport systems","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhancing transparency in communication, building trust through consistent and reliable information, and taking decisive action based on scientific evidence.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting public awareness, education on the importance of individual responsibility, and incentivizing compliance with public health guidelines.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of balanced and fact-based reporting, development of media literacy programs","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological support, balanced news reporting, stress management techniques","category":"Mental health support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engaging and informative communication strategies, targeted messaging","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide tailored guidance for individuals with pre-existing conditions, promote vaccination","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide mental health support, offer information on managing covid-19 fears","category":"Mental health support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide mental health support and accurate information","category":"Mental health support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Education on the importance of staying informed","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased awareness campaigns, targeted education about the importance of staying informed","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological support services, mental health interventions, proactive communication strategies to address pandemic fatigue","category":"Mental health support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public health messaging, targeted interventions to address misinformation, community engagement efforts","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement targeted messaging and education campaigns for younger individuals","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide mental health support and stress management resources","category":"Mental health support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote balanced and accurate reporting, limit exposure to distressful content","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balancing positive and negative information in media coverage, providing accurate and engaging content to maintain public interest.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhancing the communication skills of healthcare professionals to engage public interest, integrating public health messaging in healthcare settings.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use targeted outreach strategies to diversify respondent demographics and incentivize participation from underrepresented groups.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health campaigns and interventions to engage younger age groups in adherence to pandemic control measures.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Develop tailored communication strategies and targeted information dissemination to address factors contributing to diminished interest and avoidance of covid-19 news.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful testing and validation of far-uvc light effectiveness","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict safety protocols and containment measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication of limitations of far-uvc light effectiveness","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize far-uvc light to inactivate the coronaviruses in the aerosols","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize far-uvc light to prevent viral integration in human lung host cells","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of far-uvc light at 222 nm to inactivate airborne viruses","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development and deployment of effective countermeasures to reduce indoor person-to-person transmission","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of filtered excimer lamps to minimize biological damage","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing additional disinfection methods","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardizing the assessment methods","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting specific sensitivity studies for each strain","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and controlling the duration of far-uvc exposure, ensuring compliance with regulatory limits","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular review and updating of dose limits based on new research and technology advancements","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict containment protocols and biosafety measures during propagation and handling of viral strains.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of sealed and controlled aerosol chambers, strict operational protocols, and regular monitoring of chamber conditions.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of the uv exposure chamber","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use protective clothing and eyewear, limit exposure time, and use uv-blocking materials","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularly replace plastic windows, calibrate uv transmission measurements, and monitor for degradation","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adjust exposure time, distance, and intensity to control uv dose on aerosol particles","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment, proper ventilation, and decontamination procedures","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of biosafety cabinets, personal protective equipment, and adherence to biosafety guidelines","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use proper personal protective equipment ppe and handle virus in a biosafety level 2 bsl-2 laboratory","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces and equipment, proper waste disposal","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use proper statistical methods for calculation, double-check calculations, peer review of results","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment ppe , and proper decontamination procedures.","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to biosecurity protocols, regular testing of researchers and lab personnel, use of personal protective equipment","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase sample sizes, validate results with additional experiments, use alternative statistical methods for estimation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thorough validation of statistical models, peer review of analyses, use of alternative modeling
